mapper.insert: insert into user_tb (user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, email, phone, is_leave, is_pause, zonecode, first_address, second_address) values( user_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{phone}, 0, 0, #{zoneCode}, #{firstAddress}, #{secondAddress} )
